Hi all, 

After I posted the question to this mailing list,I got so many r=
eplies
from all you guys. I think I've got what I want to learn and decide =
to
start PRACTICING right now. 

Here is the summary of what I learned:

* =
automated unit testing is possible for commericial software development.
* =
for experienced testers, the time should be shorter.
* for team new to unit=
 testing, there may be some prodctivity drop at
the  begining. Like the fir=
st 3-6 months. 
* it is best to consider the extra effort, like learning cu=
rve,
especially at the project planning phase. 
* and lots more ...

Thanks=
 to all who ever helped. 

Cheers, 
- Frank
